TEXT.TITLE: GE <GE> GETS 133.0 MLN DLR MILITARY CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: RCA Inc of Moorestown, N.J., a division of General Electric, has been awarded a 133.0 mln dlr contract for work on the Aegis weapons system, the Navy said. REUTER
